original_text: The sea gave up the dead that were in it, and death and Hades gave up the dead that were in them, and each person was judged according to what they had done.
korean_text: 바다가 그 가운데에서 죽은 자들을 내주고 또 사망과 음부도 그 가운데에서 죽은 자들을 내주매 각 사람이 자기의 행위대로 심판을 받고

sentences.original_text: The sea gave up the dead that were in it
sentences.korean_translation: 바다는 그 안에 있는 죽은 자들을 내어놓고

sentences.original_text: and death and Hades gave up the dead
according to what they had done
